sqlMap.select:
SELECT DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,MEDA_CODE ,TO_CHAR(MEDA_NAME) AS MEDA_NAME ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,NVL(SUM(ESTI_AMTX),0) AS ESTI_AMTX ,NVL(SUM(DEND_AMTX),0) AS DEND_AMTX ,NVL(SUM(SUJU_AMTX),0) AS SUJU_AMTX ,NVL(SUM(NESU_AMTX),0) AS NESU_AMTX , TO_CHAR(DECODE(NVL(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0),0,0,DECODE(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0,0,ROUND((SUM(DEND_AMTX2)-SUM(SUJU_AMTX2))/SUM(DEND_AMTX2)*100,2))),'fm999,999,999,999,999.0') AS NESU_RATE , ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) AS YEARMON ,B.PLAN_DEPT AS DEPT_CODE ,E.DEPT_NAME ,B.MEDA_CODE , C.COMD_CDNM AS MEDA_NAME , COUNT(B.JOBN_NUMB) AS CNT ,SUM(A.ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX ,SUM((A.DEND_AMTX -NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0))) AS NESU_AMTX ,SUM(G.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX2 ,SUM(NVL(G.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX2 ,H.ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TM_CODEXD C ON B.MEDA_CODE = C.COMD_CODE AND C.COMM_CODE = 'CLAS_CODE' LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON B.CUST_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_DEPTXM E ON B.PLAN_DEPT = E.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT A.PREE_CODE ,SUM(ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(B.DOME_YN,'N') = 'N' GROUP BY A.PREE_CODE )G ON A.PREE_CODE = G.PREE_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.PLAN_DEPT , SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY B.PLAN_DEPT )H ON B.PLAN_DEPT = H.PLAN_DEPT WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6),D.AGCY_YSNO,B.MEDA_CODE ,B.PLAN_DEPT,C.COMD_CDNM,E.DEPT_NAME ,H.ROW_NUM )A GROUP BY MEDA_CODE, MEDA_NAME ,DEPT_CODE,DEPT_NAME, ROW_NUM UNION ALL SELECT DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,NULL MEDA_CODE ,'소계' MEDA_NAME ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,SUM(ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX ,SUM(NESU_AMTX) AS NESU_AMTX , TO_CHAR(DECODE(NVL(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0),0,0,DECODE(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0,0,ROUND((SUM(DEND_AMTX2)-SUM(SUJU_AMTX2))/SUM(DEND_AMTX2)*100,2))),'fm999,999,999,999,999.0') AS NESU_RATE , ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) AS YEARMON , B.PLAN_DEPT AS DEPT_CODE , E.DEPT_NAME , B.MEDA_CODE , C.COMD_CDNM AS MEDA_NAME , COUNT(B.JOBN_NUMB) AS CNT ,SUM(A.ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX ,SUM((A.DEND_AMTX -NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0))) AS NESU_AMTX ,SUM(G.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX2 ,SUM(NVL(G.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX2 ,NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N') AS AGCY_YSNO ,H.ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TM_CODEXD C ON B.MEDA_CODE = C.COMD_CODE AND C.COMM_CODE = 'CLAS_CODE' LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON B.CUST_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_DEPTXM E ON B.PLAN_DEPT = E.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT A.PREE_CODE ,SUM(ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(B.DOME_YN,'N') = 'N' GROUP BY A.PREE_CODE )G ON A.PREE_CODE = G.PREE_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.PLAN_DEPT , SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY B.PLAN_DEPT )H ON B.PLAN_DEPT = H.PLAN_DEPT WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6),D.AGCY_YSNO,B.PLAN_DEPT ,B.MEDA_CODE,C.COMD_CDNM, E.DEPT_NAME,H.ROW_NUM )A GROUP BY DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME,ROW_NUM UNION ALL SELECT 'ZZZZZZ' DEPT_CODE ,NULL DEPT_NAME ,NULL MEDA_CODE ,'합계' MEDA_NAME ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,SUM(ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX ,SUM(NESU_AMTX) AS NESU_AMTX , TO_CHAR(DECODE(NVL(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0),0,0,DECODE(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0,0,ROUND((SUM(DEND_AMTX2)-SUM(SUJU_AMTX2))/SUM(DEND_AMTX2)*100,2))),'fm999,999,999,999,999.0') AS NESU_RATE , NULL AS ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) AS YEARMON , B.PLAN_DEPT AS DEPT_CODE , E.DEPT_NAME , B.MEDA_CODE , C.COMD_CDNM AS MEDA_NAME , COUNT(B.JOBN_NUMB) AS CNT ,SUM(A.ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX ,SUM((A.DEND_AMTX -NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0))) AS NESU_AMTX ,SUM(G.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX2 ,SUM(NVL(G.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX2 ,NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N') AS AGCY_YSNO FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TM_CODEXD C ON B.MEDA_CODE = C.COMD_CODE AND C.COMM_CODE = 'CLAS_CODE' LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON B.CUST_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_DEPTXM E ON B.PLAN_DEPT = E.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT A.PREE_CODE ,SUM(ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(B.DOME_YN,'N') = 'N' GROUP BY A.PREE_CODE )G ON A.PREE_CODE = G.PREE_CODE WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6),D.AGCY_YSNO,B.PLAN_DEPT ,B.MEDA_CODE,C.COMD_CDNM, E.DEPT_NAME )A ORDER BY ROW_NUM, DEPT_CODE, MEDA_CODE, CNT DESC

SELECT DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,MEDA_CODE ,TO_CHAR(MEDA_NAME) AS MEDA_NAME ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,NVL(SUM(ESTI_AMTX),0) AS ESTI_AMTX ,NVL(SUM(DEND_AMTX),0) AS DEND_AMTX ,NVL(SUM(SUJU_AMTX),0) AS SUJU_AMTX ,NVL(SUM(NESU_AMTX),0) AS NESU_AMTX , TO_CHAR(DECODE(NVL(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0),0,0,DECODE(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0,0,ROUND((SUM(DEND_AMTX2)-SUM(SUJU_AMTX2))/SUM(DEND_AMTX2)*100,2))),'fm999,999,999,999,999.0') AS NESU_RATE , ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) AS YEARMON ,B.PROD_DEPT AS DEPT_CODE ,E.DEPT_NAME ,B.MEDA_CODE , C.COMD_CDNM AS MEDA_NAME , COUNT(B.JOBN_NUMB) AS CNT ,SUM(A.ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX ,SUM((A.DEND_AMTX -NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0))) AS NESU_AMTX ,SUM(G.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX2 ,SUM(NVL(G.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX2 , H.ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TM_CODEXD C ON B.MEDA_CODE = C.COMD_CODE AND C.COMM_CODE = 'CLAS_CODE' LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON B.CUST_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_DEPTXM E ON B.PROD_DEPT = E.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT A.PREE_CODE ,SUM(ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(B.DOME_YN,'N') = 'N' GROUP BY A.PREE_CODE )G ON A.PREE_CODE = G.PREE_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.PROD_DEPT , SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY B.PROD_DEPT )H ON B.PROD_DEPT = H.PROD_DEPT WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6),D.AGCY_YSNO,B.MEDA_CODE ,B.PROD_DEPT,C.COMD_CDNM,E.DEPT_NAME , H.ROW_NUM )A GROUP BY MEDA_CODE, MEDA_NAME ,DEPT_CODE,DEPT_NAME, ROW_NUM UNION ALL SELECT DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,NULL MEDA_CODE ,'소계' MEDA_NAME ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,SUM(ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX ,SUM(NESU_AMTX) AS NESU_AMTX , TO_CHAR(DECODE(NVL(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0),0,0,DECODE(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0,0,ROUND((SUM(DEND_AMTX2)-SUM(SUJU_AMTX2))/SUM(DEND_AMTX2)*100,2))),'fm999,999,999,999,999.0') AS NESU_RATE , ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) AS YEARMON , B.PROD_DEPT AS DEPT_CODE , E.DEPT_NAME , B.MEDA_CODE , C.COMD_CDNM AS MEDA_NAME , COUNT(B.JOBN_NUMB) AS CNT ,SUM(A.ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX ,SUM((A.DEND_AMTX -NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0))) AS NESU_AMTX ,SUM(G.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX2 ,SUM(NVL(G.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX2 ,NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N') AS AGCY_YSNO , H.ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TM_CODEXD C ON B.MEDA_CODE = C.COMD_CODE AND C.COMM_CODE = 'CLAS_CODE' LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON B.CUST_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_DEPTXM E ON B.PROD_DEPT = E.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT A.PREE_CODE ,SUM(ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(B.DOME_YN,'N') = 'N' GROUP BY A.PREE_CODE )G ON A.PREE_CODE = G.PREE_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.PROD_DEPT , SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY B.PROD_DEPT )H ON B.PROD_DEPT = H.PROD_DEPT WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6),D.AGCY_YSNO,B.PROD_DEPT ,B.MEDA_CODE,C.COMD_CDNM, E.DEPT_NAME, H.ROW_NUM )A GROUP BY DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, ROW_NUM UNION ALL SELECT 'ZZZZZZ' DEPT_CODE ,NULL DEPT_NAME ,NULL MEDA_CODE ,'합계' MEDA_NAME ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,SUM(ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX ,SUM(NESU_AMTX) AS NESU_AMTX , TO_CHAR(DECODE(NVL(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0),0,0,DECODE(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0,0,ROUND((SUM(DEND_AMTX2)-SUM(SUJU_AMTX2))/SUM(DEND_AMTX2)*100,2))),'fm999,999,999,999,999.0') AS NESU_RATE , NULL ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) AS YEARMON , B.PROD_DEPT AS DEPT_CODE , E.DEPT_NAME , B.MEDA_CODE , C.COMD_CDNM AS MEDA_NAME , COUNT(B.JOBN_NUMB) AS CNT ,SUM(A.ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX ,SUM((A.DEND_AMTX -NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0))) AS NESU_AMTX ,SUM(G.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX2 ,SUM(NVL(G.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX2 ,NVL(D.AGCY_YSNO,'N') AS AGCY_YSNO , H.ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TM_CODEXD C ON B.MEDA_CODE = C.COMD_CODE AND C.COMM_CODE = 'CLAS_CODE' LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON B.CUST_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_DEPTXM E ON B.PROD_DEPT = E.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT A.PREE_CODE ,SUM(ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(B.DOME_YN,'N') = 'N' GROUP BY A.PREE_CODE )G ON A.PREE_CODE = G.PREE_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.PROD_DEPT , SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY B.PROD_DEPT )H ON B.PROD_DEPT = H.PROD_DEPT WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6),D.AGCY_YSNO,B.PROD_DEPT ,B.MEDA_CODE,C.COMD_CDNM, E.DEPT_NAME, H.ROW_NUM )A ORDER BY ROW_NUM, DEPT_CODE, MEDA_CODE, CNT DESC

SELECT #YEAR_MONT1# YEAR_MONT1 ,#YEAR_MONT2# YEAR_MONT2 ,DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,MEDA_CODE ,MEDA_NAME ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,NVL(SUM(ESTI_AMTX),0) AS ESTI_AMTX ,NVL(SUM(DEND_AMTX),0) AS DEND_AMTX ,NVL(SUM(SUJU_AMTX),0) AS SUJU_AMTX ,NVL(SUM(NESU_AMTX),0) AS NESU_AMTX , TO_CHAR(DECODE(NVL(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0),0,0,DECODE(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0,0,ROUND((SUM(DEND_AMTX2)-SUM(SUJU_AMTX2))/SUM(DEND_AMTX2)*100,2))),'fm999,999,999,999,999.0') AS NESU_RATE ,SUM(DEND_AMTX2) AS DEND_AMTX2 ,SUM(SUJU_AMTX2) AS SUJU_AMTX2 FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) AS YEARMON ,B.PLAN_DEPT AS DEPT_CODE ,E.DEPT_NAME ,B.MEDA_CODE , C.COMD_CDNM AS MEDA_NAME , COUNT(B.JOBN_NUMB) AS CNT ,SUM(A.ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX ,SUM((A.DEND_AMTX -NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0))) AS NESU_AMTX ,SUM(G.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX2 ,SUM(NVL(G.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX2 ,H.ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TM_CODEXD C ON B.MEDA_CODE = C.COMD_CODE AND C.COMM_CODE = 'CLAS_CODE' LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON B.CUST_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_DEPTXM E ON B.PLAN_DEPT = E.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT A.PREE_CODE ,SUM(ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(B.DOME_YN,'N') = 'N' GROUP BY A.PREE_CODE )G ON A.PREE_CODE = G.PREE_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.PLAN_DEPT , SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY B.PLAN_DEPT )H ON B.PLAN_DEPT = H.PLAN_DEPT WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6),D.AGCY_YSNO,B.MEDA_CODE ,B.PLAN_DEPT, C.COMD_CDNM,E.DEPT_NAME ,H.ROW_NUM )A GROUP BY MEDA_CODE, MEDA_NAME,DEPT_CODE,DEPT_NAME, ROW_NUM ORDER BY ROW_NUM, DEPT_CODE, MEDA_CODE, CNT DESC

SELECT #YEAR_MONT1# YEAR_MONT1 ,#YEAR_MONT2# YEAR_MONT2 ,DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,MEDA_CODE ,MEDA_NAME ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,NVL(SUM(ESTI_AMTX),0) AS ESTI_AMTX ,NVL(SUM(DEND_AMTX),0) AS DEND_AMTX ,NVL(SUM(SUJU_AMTX),0) AS SUJU_AMTX ,NVL(SUM(NESU_AMTX),0) AS NESU_AMTX , TO_CHAR(DECODE(NVL(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0),0,0,DECODE(SUM(DEND_AMTX2),0,0,ROUND((SUM(DEND_AMTX2)-SUM(SUJU_AMTX2))/SUM(DEND_AMTX2)*100,2))),'fm999,999,999,999,999.0') AS NESU_RATE ,SUM(DEND_AMTX2) AS DEND_AMTX2 ,SUM(SUJU_AMTX2) AS SUJU_AMTX2 FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6) AS YEARMON ,B.PROD_DEPT AS DEPT_CODE ,E.DEPT_NAME ,B.MEDA_CODE , C.COMD_CDNM AS MEDA_NAME , COUNT(B.JOBN_NUMB) AS CNT ,SUM(A.ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX ,SUM((A.DEND_AMTX -NVL(A.SUJU_AMTX,0))) AS NESU_AMTX ,SUM(G.DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX2 ,SUM(NVL(G.SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX2 ,H.ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB LEFT JOIN TM_CODEXD C ON B.MEDA_CODE = C.COMD_CODE AND C.COMM_CODE = 'CLAS_CODE' LEFT JOIN PD_CLASXM D ON B.CUST_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_DEPTXM E ON B.PROD_DEPT = E.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT A.PREE_CODE ,SUM(ESTI_AMTX) AS ESTI_AMTX ,SUM(DEND_AMTX) AS DEND_AMTX ,SUM(NVL(SUJU_AMTX,0)) AS SUJU_AMTX FROM PD_SUJUMD A LEFT JOIN PD_ITEMXD B ON A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(B.DOME_YN,'N') = 'N' GROUP BY A.PREE_CODE )G ON A.PREE_CODE = G.PREE_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.PROD_DEPT , SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(A.DEND_AMTX) DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM PD_SUJUMH A LEFT JOIN PD_JOBNXM B ON A.JOBN_NUMB = B.JOBN_NUMB WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY B.PROD_DEPT )H ON B.PROD_DEPT = H.PROD_DEPT WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY SUBSTR(B.DEND_DATE,0,6),D.AGCY_YSNO,B.MEDA_CODE ,B.PROD_DEPT, C.COMD_CDNM,E.DEPT_NAME,H.ROW_NUM )A GROUP BY MEDA_CODE, MEDA_NAME,DEPT_CODE,DEPT_NAME,ROW_NUM ORDER BY ROW_NUM, DEPT_CODE, MEDA_CODE, CNT DESC
